entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
